2026-01-30JUSNorthwest Territories ActOrder Appointing the Hon. Sadie Bond to be a Deputy Judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories Order appointing the Honourable Sadie Bond, a current judge of the Court of King’s Bench of Manitoba, to be a deputy judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories.N/A
subject: Order Appointing the Hon. Sadie Bond to be a Deputy Judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories
precis: Order appointing the Honourable Sadie Bond, a current judge of the Court of King’s Bench of Manitoba, to be a deputy judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories.
